system.description: Saurages in Teriock have piercings corresponding to their clan of origin. Saurages are generally tribal and often have trouble adjusting to cities and guilds.
system.appearance: Saurages look like humanoid lizard men and are native to the southern deserts in mainland Teriock. They are about human sized and covered in scales, but have no tails.

overview.base: While in deserts, your MOV score is increased by 1. Outside of deserts, it is decreased by 1.
You deboost damage caused by desert weather.
Armor you wear must be custom-made to fit you.
You always have at least 2 AV. This is the case even when you are not wearing armor.
You are a talented hunter.
You are a talented tracker.
